name: Sapling (deejuu, ladymudkipz)
description:
Made for the Go Godot Jam 2021: GROWTH

Sprout your sapling and race to the sunlight with what little energy you can gather. How fast can you reach the tree tops.

Controls:

  • Left/Right Mouse Click & drag to aim your sapling's stem and branches
  • Release LMB/RMB to grow stem or branch
  • [R] to restart level

Mechanics:

  • Escape the tree canopy to reach the sun
  • Use energy to grow sapling
  • Stems gain you height and allow two (2) branches to be grown
  • Branches spawn leaves based on their length
  • Collect sunlight as it spawns using your leaves
  • Sunlight spawns throughout the level constantly but spawns slow down over time
  • Longer stems and branch segments are more expensive to grow
  • Stems are restricted to an upward trajectory

Credits in-game.
